property.name: lastRoom
property.value: SELECT Max(Room) AS LastRoom FROM dbo.worker

property.name: workerList
property.value: SELECT WK.Room, WK.Name, PR.ProfessionName, EN.EnduranceName, WK.Cost FROM dbo.Worker WK INNER JOIN dbo.Profession PR ON PR.Profession = WK.Profession INNER JOIN Endurance EN ON EN.Endurance = WK.Endurance ORDER BY WK.Room;

property.name: insert
property.value: INSERT INTO worker (Room, Name, Profession, Endurance, Cost) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?, ?)
